TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract TileBrush extends System.Windows.Media.Brush
Public MustInherit Class TileBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class TileBrush abstract : System::Windows::Media::Brush

summary.span: 描述使用一個或多個並排顯示來繪製區域的方式。

span.span: Describes a way to paint a region by using one or more tiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別定義您用來繪製區域的圖格的內容。The derived classes of define the contents of the tiles that you use to paint a region. 例如，使用類別來使用影像繪製區域。For example, use the class to paint an area by using an image. 使用控制繪製區域的方式。Use a to control how you paint an area. 比方說，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供數種類型的筆刷：For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides several types of brushes: - 若要繪製所使用的映像，請使用。To paint by using an image, use the . - 若要繪製的繪圖，請使用。To paint by drawing, use the . - 藉由繪製，使用。To paint by using a , use the . 當您使用繪製區域，而不是繪製區域使用單一自動縮放的影像，您可以使用一系列影像並排顯示圖樣來繪製區域。When you use the to paint an area, instead of painting an area by using a single stretched image, you can paint an area by using a series of image tiles that create a pattern. 當您使用繪製區域，您可以使用三個元件： 內容、 磚和 [輸出] 區域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下列圖例顯示如何這三個元件與彼此相關。The following illustrations show how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有單一並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") TileMode 為 Tile 之 TileBrush 的元件Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile **內容**:A可以有不同類型的內容：**Content**: A can have different types of content: - 如果筆刷是，此內容是映像。If the brush is an , this content is an image. 屬性指定的內容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果筆刷是，此內容為繪圖。If the brush is a , this content is a drawing. 屬性指定的內容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果筆刷是，此內容為視覺物件。If the brush is a , this content is a visual. 屬性指定的內容。The property specifies the content of the . 您可以指定的位置和維度內容使用屬性。You can specify the position and dimensions of content by using the property. **圖格**:A會產生一或多個圖格。**Tiles**: A produces one or more tiles. 根據預設，筆刷的內容會縮放以填滿單一並排顯示，而且該磚會縮放以填滿輸出區域。By default, the content of the brush is stretched to fill a single tile and that tile is stretched to fill the output area. 屬性用來指定的大小和位置的基底的並排顯示。The property is used to specify the size and position of the base tile for the . 屬性會決定是否的大小和位置相對於輸出區域 （預設行為），或是否為絕對值。The property determines whether the size and position of the are relative to the output area (the default behavior) or whether they are absolute values. **輸出區域**:輸出區域就是這類的筆刷繪製的區域的或的。**Output Area**: The output area is the area that the brush paints, such as the of an or the of a . 如需詳細資訊類別，請參閱[使用影像、 繪圖和視覺效果繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)。For more information about the class, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md) . ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是型別。A is a type. 如需功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the method.

para.span: 如需有關繼承自類型，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information about inheriting from types, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定 基底拼貼中內容的水平對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of content in the base tile.

value.span: 指定 內容在其基底拼貼中的水平位置值。

span.span: A value that specifies the horizontal position of content in its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性的會使用其中一個下列條件為 true 時：The and properties of a are used when either of the following conditions is true: - 屬性是或是而和有不同的外觀比例。The property is or and the and have different aspect ratios. - 屬性是並和大小不同。The property is and the and are different sizes. 請注意，您指定的尺寸使用內容屬性; 您指定的位置和大小基底的並排顯示依據使用屬性。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定 基底磚中內容的垂直對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of content in the base tile.

value.span: 指定 內容在其基底磚中之垂直位置的值。

span.span: A value that specifies the vertical position of content in its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並屬性的其中下列條件成立時，會使用：The and properties of a are used when either of the following conditions are true: - 屬性是或是而和有不同的外觀比例。The property is or and the and have different aspect ratios. - 屬性是並和大小不同。The property is and the and are different sizes. 請注意，您指定的尺寸使用內容屬性; 您指定的位置和大小基底的並排顯示依據使用屬性。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 藉由製作這個 值的深層複本，來建立它的可修改複本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable copy of this by making deep copies of its values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

span.span: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性仍會傳回 。

span.span: The property of the cloned object returns even if the property of the source is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀物件。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 當這個方法會複製相依性屬性時，會複製資源參考和資料繫結，但可能已不再解析也一樣。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve. 它不會複製動畫或其目前的值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.TileBrush CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

span.span: Creates a modifiable copy of this object by making deep copies of its values.

summary.span: 這個方法不會複製資源參考、資料繫結或動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, or animations, although it does copy their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

span.span: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性仍為 。

span.span: The property of the cloned object is even if the property of the source is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀物件。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Stretch Stretch { System::Windows::Media::Stretch get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Stretch value); };
member this.Stretch : System.Windows.Media.Stretch with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定如何自動縮放這個 的內容，以符合其並排顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the content of this stretches to fit its tiles.

value.span: 值，指定如何將這個 內容投射到它的基底並排顯示。

span.span: A value that specifies how this content is projected onto its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以接受下列值，其中列舉型別定義：The property accepts the following values, which the enumeration defines: - ：內容不會自動縮放以填滿並排顯示。: The content does not stretch to fill the tile. - ：內容會縮放以符合 tile 維度。: The content is scaled to fit the tile dimensions. 不過，會保留長寬比的內容。However, the aspect ratio of the content is preserved. - ：內容會縮放以完全填滿輸出區域，但會保留其原始外觀比例。: The content is scaled so that it completely fills the output area but preserves its original aspect ratio. - ：內容會縮放以符合並排顯示。: The content is scaled to fit the tile. 因為內容的高度和寬度會分開縮放，所以可能不會保留內容的原始外觀比例。Because the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the content might not be preserved. 也就是內容可能會扭曲，以完全填滿輸出並排顯示。That is, the content might be distorted in order to completely fill the output tile. 下圖說明不同設定。The following image illustrates the different settings. ![不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的縮放設定Different stretch settings 請注意，您指定的尺寸使用內容屬性; 您指定的位置和大小基底的並排顯示依據使用屬性。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## Viewbox 裁剪部分Viewbox Clipping 內容永遠不會裁剪為。 contents are never clipped to the . 不過，內容*會*裁剪邊緣，可設定的維度基底並排顯示。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the dimensions for the base tile. 下圖顯示不同的效果上的設定具有小於其。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 外部影像的部分是淡色的灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty StretchProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly StretchProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::TileMode TileMode { System::Windows::Media::TileMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::TileMode value); };
member this.TileMode : System.Windows.Media.TileMode with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定當基底並排顯示小於輸出區域時， 如何填入您所繪製的區域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how a fills the area that you are painting if the base tile is smaller than the output area.

value.span: 值，指定當 屬性指定的基底並排顯示小於輸出區域時， 並排顯示如何填入輸出區域。

span.span: A value that specifies how the tiles fill the output area when the base tile, which is specified by the property, is smaller than the output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示不同的並排顯示模式，針對個別的列舉型別。The following illustration shows the different tile modes, which are defined by the enumeration. ![不同的 TileBrush TileMode 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "不同的 TileBrush TileMode 設定")![Different TileBrush TileMode settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "Different TileBrush TileMode settings") TileMode 列舉可用的並排顯示模式Available tile modes for the TileMode enumeration 針對屬性，讓作用中，您必須設定筆刷為小於您所繪製 （輸出區域） 區域的大小。For the property to have an effect, you must set the for the brush to a size that is smaller than the area that you are painting (the output area). 如果大小等於或超過輸出區域、 筆刷會產生單一並排顯示可展開以填滿輸出區域和任何並排顯示模式，就會發生。If the size is equal to or exceeds the output area, the brush produces a single tile that expands to fill the output area, and no tile pattern occurs. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty TileModeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly TileModeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 取得或設定內容在 並排顯示中的位置和維度。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the content in a tile.
The position and dimensions of the content.

value.span: 預設值是 為 (0,0) 而 和 為 1 的矩形 ()。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () that has a of (0,0), and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用繪製區域，您可以使用三個元件： 內容、 磚和 [輸出] 區域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 屬性指定的大小和位置內容。The property specifies the size and position of content. 下圖顯示如何這三個元件與彼此相關。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") TileBrush 元件TileBrush components ![並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 屬性會決定是否值會解譯為相對或絕對的值。The property determines whether the value is interpreted as a relative or absolute value. 預設的情況下， 屬性設定為 。By default, the property is set to . ## Viewbox 裁剪部分Viewbox Clipping 內容永遠不會裁剪為。 contents are never clipped to the . 不過，內容*會*裁剪邊緣，可設定基底的並排顯示的值。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the values for the base tile. 下圖顯示不同的效果上的設定具有小於其。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 外部影像的部分是淡色的灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同 Stretch 設定的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 您可以指定的大小和位置內容使用屬性。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 屬性會決定是否值是相對於 meze內容或它是否為絕對值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. 第一張圖例顯示 100 x 100 像素影像，然後再使用此映像顯示不同效果屬性設定。The first illustration shows a 100 by 100 pixel image and then uses this image to show the effects of different property settings. ![映像](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "映像")![An image](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "An image") 從範例映像 （100 x 100 裝置獨立像素）Beginning sample image (100 by 100 device independent pixels) 下圖顯示的輸出使用的 0.0,0.0，0.25,0.5。The following illustration shows the output of a that uses a of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5. 其他相關屬性的值如下：Other relevant property values include the following: - : （預設值）: (default) - ：0,0,1,1: 0,0,1,1 - : : - , : , : 下圖顯示數個不同屬性設定。This illustration shows several different property settings. 屬性會決定如何會自動縮放其填滿其。The property determines how a stretches its to fill its . ![Viewbox 為 0，0 0.25,0.5 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "0，0 0.25,0.5 0.5 的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5") TileBrush 0.0,0.0，相對 Viewbox 0.25,0.5TileBrush with a relative Viewbox of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5 下圖顯示類似但相對的 0.5,0.25，0.25,0.5。The next illustration shows a similar but with a relative of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. ![0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 0.5 的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 0.5 的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 類似的 TileBrush 但具有不同的 Viewbox 設定Similar TileBrush but with a different Viewbox setting 下圖顯示相同但相對0.0,0.0，值 0.5，0.5 並的。The next illustration shows the same but with a relative value of 0.0,0.0, 0.5,0.5 and a of . ![檢視的 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 的檢視")![TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 類似的 TileBrush 並排顯示與不同的檢視區設定，但Similar TileBrush but with tiling and a different Viewport setting 下列範例示範如何建立並排具有的 0.5,0.25，0.25,0.5。The following example shows how to create a tiled that has a of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. [!code-xaml[BrushOverviewExamples_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_snip/XAML/ViewboxExample.xaml#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)] [!code-csharp[BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip/CSharp/ViewboxExample.cs#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)] [!code-vb[BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip/visualbasic/viewboxexample.vb#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 值是相對於 內容的週框方塊，還是絕對值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether the value is absolute.

value.span: 值，表示 值是相對於 內容的週框方塊，或是否為絕對值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether it is an absolute value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為表示相對於週框方塊的內容。A value of indicates that the are relative to the bounding box of the content. 請注意，值為指定裝置獨立畫素，而不是裝置像素，視裝置而定。Note that a value of specifies device independent pixels instead of device pixels, which are device dependent. 因此，值時套用時，每個像素表示的 1/96 英吋為單位。Therefore, when a value of applies, each pixel represents 1/96th of an inch. 當您指定時，您必須記得這個像素區別的具有做為其來源。You must remember this pixel distinction when you specify the of an that has a as its source. 比方說，當您使用標準的像素做為量值時，300 乘 300 像素映像時只有一英吋寬的影像解析度是 300 dpi。For example, when you use the standard pixel as a measure, a 300 by 300 pixel image is only one inch in width if the image resolution is 300 dots per inch. 不過，當您想要設定為絕對值，您必須設定到 0，0、 96 （96） 以包含整個影像。However, when you want to set an absolute value, you must set the to (0, 0, 96, 96) in order to include the whole image. 您可以指定的大小和位置內容使用屬性。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 屬性會決定是否值是相對於 meze內容或它是否為絕對值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect Viewport { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };
member this.Viewport : System.Windows.Rect with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 之基底並排顯示的位置和維度。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 之基底並排顯示的位置和維度。

span.span: The position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 預設值是 為 (0,0) 而 和 為 1 的 () 矩形。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () with a of (0,0) and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用繪製區域，您可以使用三個元件： 內容、 磚和 [輸出] 區域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下圖顯示如何這三個元件與彼此相關。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 元件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 元件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有單一並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "並排顯示之 TileBrush 的元件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") TileMode 為 Tile 之 TileBrush 的元件Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile 屬性會決定的大小和位置中的圖格。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 根據預設，具有單一並排顯示填滿整個輸出區域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 屬性會控制如何內容放入該圖格。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 您可以覆寫此預設行為，並使用指定的並排顯示大小屬性。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用屬性來指定是否使用絕對或相對座標。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果是相對座標，則它們會相對於輸出區域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 點 (0，0) 表示輸出區域和 (1，1) 表示右下角邊角的輸出區域的左上角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定屬性使用絕對座標，請將屬性設。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下圖顯示在輸出中的差異，當您設定屬性以相對或絕對。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![絕對與相對的檢視區單元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "絕對與相對的檢視區單元")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相對與絕對 ViewportUnitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉，這個列舉指定 (表示 基底並排顯示的大小和位置) 的值是否相對於輸出區域的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies whether the value of the , which indicates the size and position of the base tile, is relative to the size of the output area.

value.span: 表示 (描述 並排顯示的大小和位置) 的值是否相對於整個輸出區域的大小。

span.span: Indicates whether the value of the , which describes the size and position of the tiles, is relative to the size of the whole output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定的大小和位置中的圖格。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 根據預設，具有單一並排顯示填滿整個輸出區域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 屬性會控制如何內容放入該圖格。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 您可以覆寫此預設行為，並使用指定的並排顯示大小屬性。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用屬性來指定是否使用絕對或相對座標。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果是相對座標，則它們會相對於輸出區域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 點 (0，0) 表示輸出區域和 (1，1) 表示右下角邊角的輸出區域的左上角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定屬性使用絕對座標，請將屬性設。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下圖顯示在輸出中的差異，當您設定屬性以相對或絕對。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![絕對與相對的檢視區單元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "絕對與相對的檢視區單元")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相對與絕對 ViewportUnitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
